name: Grub 2 Bug
description:
Bug 2 Grub

Tavo explores around his apartment building to discover if anyone else is having a buggy transition like he is. Meet quirky characters with comedic dialogue and mini tasks to come to the ultimate decision: stay as a bug or return to being human!

Use the arrow keys to move around.

This game was made during Game Jam Aoteroa 2022 using Unity Playground scripts (thus disqualified) & all original artwork assets (Adobe Photoshop & Toon Boom Harmony) in 48 hours.

Created by:

  • Ruby Meades
  • Christopher Popham
  • Melissa Bustamante
  • Max Candy
  • & Eyessa Gentle

Thanks to the facilities at SIT Te Rau o Te Huia Campus!

Install instructions

Download the Executable folder and double click the Unity_DualityofDAD application file to play on PC.

It needs everything in that zipped folder to play.

Updates will hopefully happen later with added idle animations!
